concept.title: Concept
concept.shortdesc: An explanation of the Concept DITA information type.

conbody.p: The Concept topic is one of the three base DITA information types.

li.p: Used for documenting conceptual or overview information.
Contains background information users must know before working with a product or process.
Comprised primarily of simple paragraphs and unordered lists.

section.title: Question Addressed
section.p: Concept topics answer the question "what is?"

section.title: Root Element
section.p: The root element of a Concept topic is <concept>.
